attributes.action: Take action to bring a end to Tony Fallows's Football career.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign the followng petition as it has become quite clear that Tony Fallows aka tony the mank,city tony will not bring down the curtain on his own career,we have to act now before he ends up on a slab.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
